voice_instruct: A man in his thirties with a haunted, hollow whisper that occasionally erupts into anguished intensity. The voice of someone who has been forced to commit atrocities he believes are sins. Thin, precise, with the cadence of ritual prayer corrupted by madness.

tracks.title: Truthless
tracks.prompt: dark industrial ambient, haunted male whisper vocals, metallic drones, Nine Inch Nails meets Lustmord, C sharp minor, 66 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
truthless, they named me truthless in the stone shamans' hall
I told them the Voidbringers were returning, I told them all
the Oathstone passed from hand to hand, each owner held my soul
a truthless must obey the stone, that is the Shin's control

[chorus]
truthless, I am truthless, I walk in white
the Assassin in White who kills by another's right
every death is on my hands and every death is theirs
and I am caught between the sin and the stone's affairs

[verse 2]
but I was right, I was right, the Radiants have returned
Kaladin Stormblessed holds the wind, the truth I spoke has burned

[bridge]
in Shinovar the stone is sacred, the sword is sin
they grow their food in soil, they do not let the storms in

[chorus]
truthless, I am truthless, I walk in white
the Assassin in White who kills by another's right
every death is on my hands and every death is theirs
and I am caught between the sin and the stone's affairs

tracks.title: Gavilar's Balcony
tracks.prompt: tense dark wave, haunted male vocals, staccato synths, heartbeat bass, Depeche Mode meets Gary Numan, Eb minor, 72 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the feast of Gavilar's treaty, the night the world would turn
I walked the palace walls in white, Stormlight beginning to burn
Gavilar Kholin, king of Alethkar, stood on the balcony alone
and I descended from the darkness like a judgement carved in stone

[chorus]
brother, tell Dalinar, he must find the most important words a man can say
that is what the king whispered as the light drained away
I killed the king of Alethkar and I wept as I flew
because the truthless does not choose, the truthless must walk through

[verse 2]
he held a dark sphere, a sphere that should not exist
black light, Voidlight, power in his dying fist
and he whispered those words, those words that haunt my sleep
brother, find the most important words, and then the fall was deep

[bridge]
I left the Honorblade on the balcony beside his corpse
and I walked into the night carrying a new list

[chorus]
brother, tell Dalinar, he must find the most important words a man can say
that is what the king whispered as the light drained away
I killed the king of Alethkar and I wept as I flew
because the truthless does not choose, the truthless must walk through

tracks.title: The List
tracks.prompt: relentless industrial, haunted male vocals, machine-gun percussion, Ministry meets Skinny Puppy, A minor, 78 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
king Hanavanar of Jah Keved, killed in his own throne room
three Shardbearers came at once, their Blades could not connect
I Lashed them to the sky and let the fall collect

[chorus]
the list grows longer, name by name by name
king after king after highprince, and the sin is always the same
I am the weapon, I did not choose the hand
but the blood is on my skin and I understand

[verse 2]
Taravangian, the old king, he held my Oathstone last
his Diagram, his master plan, written in one day of brilliance
and I was the variable that balanced every line

[bridge]
each name I crossed from the list I carved into my arm
because the stone commands but the hands remember

[chorus]
the list grows longer, name by name by name
king after king after highprince, and the sin is always the same
I am the weapon, I did not choose the hand
but the blood is on my skin and I understand

tracks.title: I Am Not The Monster
tracks.prompt: claustrophobic darkwave, haunted male vocals, oppressive synth layers, Bauhaus meets Nine Inch Nails, F minor, 70 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I repeat it like a prayer, like a sutra for the damned
I am not the monster, I am not the killing hand
but at night I see their faces, every guard I cut to ground

[chorus]
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
I whisper it while walking through the blood
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
but the monster wears my face beneath the hood

[verse 2]
the afterimage follows me, the screaming in the air
what if the damnation that the Stone Shamans declared
is not a future punishment but the present that I wear

[bridge]
Nale found me, Herald of Justice, Nin-son-God
he said the law will cleanse you, boy
but the law he serves is broken

[chorus]
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
I whisper it while walking through the blood
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
but the monster wears my face beneath the hood

tracks.title: Nightblood
tracks.prompt: aggressive industrial metal, haunted male vocals with distorted secondary voice, Godflesh meets Author and Punisher, D minor, 80 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the sword speaks and its voice is wrong, too cheerful for the dark
would you like to destroy some evil today, it says, like a question mark
Nightblood, the black sword, Awakened steel from another world
black smoke pouring from the sheath, the metal singing, hungry, fed

[chorus]
destroy, destroy, the sword sings in my skull
destroy the evil, fill me up, I am never full
Nightblood cannot tell the difference between wicked and afraid
and I carry it because I am the only one who is not swayed

[verse 2]
the sword was made to end all evil, a child's wish in metal form
but a tool that cannot define evil is the center of the storm

[bridge]
would you like to destroy some evil, it asks me every dawn
maybe the evil Nightblood senses is the thing inside of me

[chorus]
destroy, destroy, the sword sings in my skull
destroy the evil, fill me up, I am never full
Nightblood cannot tell the difference between wicked and afraid
and I carry it because I am the only one who is not swayed

tracks.title: Skybreaker
tracks.prompt: martial darkwave, haunted male vocals, regimented percussion, Front 242 meets Covenant, B minor, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Nale recruited me into the Skybreakers, the order of the law
the Third Ideal, I swear to follow the law of the land
but whose law, which land, when every nation has a different hand

[chorus]
the law is a blade that cuts both ways
the law is a light that can blind on bright days
I followed the law to escape my sin
but the law without conscience is just the stone again

[verse 2]
I swore the Fourth Ideal to Dalinar, to the man not the crown
I said I will cleanse the Shin of the false leaders who brought me down
for the first time the oath was mine, not the stone's, not the law's

[bridge]
the Skybreakers teach that passion corrupts the code
but I have learned that a law without a heart
is just another oathstone, another stone apart

[chorus]
the law is a blade that cuts both ways
the law is a light that can blind on bright days
I followed the law to escape my sin
but the law without conscience is just the stone again

tracks.title: The Stones Unhallowed
tracks.prompt: atmospheric industrial, haunted male vocals, shamanic percussion, Dead Can Dance meets Einsturzende Neubauten, Ab minor, 68 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Shinovar has no storms, the mountains hold the wind at bay
the stone shamans sit at the center and decide who will survive
nine Honorblades locked in a vault, the Heralds' own weapons of power

[chorus]
the stones are not hallowed, the shamans were wrong
the stones are just stones and the song is just a song
they took the Honorblades and hid them in their shrine
and called the one who noticed truthless, they called the truth a crime

[verse 2]
I was their best weapon, a truthless they could sell
a Surgebinder with no choice, a man living in hell
and all along the real criminals wore the robes and spoke the prayers

[bridge]
I will cleanse my homeland, not with hate but with the truth
that the shamans used the sacred as a shield for their corruption

[chorus]
the stones are not hallowed, the shamans were wrong
the stones are just stones and the song is just a song
they took the Honorblades and hid them in their shrine
and called the one who noticed truthless, they called the truth a crime

tracks.title: Szeth's Peace
tracks.prompt: resolving ambient industrial, haunted male vocals softening, clean synths, Sigur Ros meets Depeche Mode, F major, 72 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I have died twice and returned each time to the same blood-stained sky
the weight of them should have crushed me, should have ground me into dust
but something in the Shin survives, call it stubbornness or trust

[chorus]
peace is not the absence of the killing
peace is the presence of the choice
I chose to serve the law, I chose to cleanse the lie
and for the first time in my life I chose my own voice

[verse 2]
Kaladin offered me something I did not expect
not forgiveness, not absolution, just a kind of respect
one soldier to another, one weapon put to rest

[bridge]
I am Szeth-son-son-Vallano, Truthless of Shinovar
but underneath the titles I am just a man from the green land

[chorus]
peace is not the absence of the killing
peace is the presence of the choice
I chose to serve the law, I chose to cleanse the lie
and for the first time in my life I chose my own voice

[outro]
the wind does not blow in Shinovar
the grass is soft beneath bare feet
and somewhere in the quiet
a man in white sits down
and does not reach for the sword
